title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press finish on the JAR packager, it shows the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: When I press finish on the JAR packager, it shows the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: To create a JAR with unsaved editors, I should be allowed to proceed. If I choose not to save the open files, I should be able to create the JAR by just confirming the selection. If unsaved files are not allowed, there should be a dialog prompting me to save the files before creating the JAR.
SR:
1. Open a file in the editor but do not save it.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project.
3. Enter all the required information such as path, destination, name, and description for the JAR packager.
4. Attempt to create the JAR packager by clicking on Finish.
